tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    support_agent_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_time TIME,
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    agent_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    customer_email VARCHAR(100),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(15),
    customer_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_interaction_history (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    support_agent_id INT,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE support_agents (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name TEXT,
    agent_department TEXT,
    agent_email TEXT,
    agent_phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    agent_id INT REFERENCES support_agents(agent_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    agent_id INT REFERENCES support_agents(agent_id),
    details TEXT
);
